attributes.action: Recognise the research on medical uses of cannabis conducted in the US.
attributes.background:
There have been countless petitions on the legal status of cannabis, but the government refuses to acknowledge peer reviewed studies that show that their policies are wrong and damaging.
http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/23648372
would be a good start.

rejection.details:
We're not quite sure what you mean by "recognise the research" in this context. 

You could start a new petition calling for a more specific example - for example, calling on the Government to publish its assessment of this evidence, or an explanation of how it has taken this evidence into account in its policy-making.
